Key Match Events: Lassina Traoré scored a double in the first half (35th, 38th minutes)
Hassane Bandé scored the third goal for Burkina Faso (60th minute, unassisted)
Zeliat Nkhoma scored for Malawi in the 80th minute
Post-Match Reflections: Hervé Koffi, Burkina Faso's coach, commented on the team's performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match took place at the Stade du 26-Mars in Bamako
Others: The Burkina Faso team included Lassina Traoré, who plays for Shakhtar Donetsk
The Burkina Faso team took the lead in Group L, with a better goal difference than Senegal
The Burundi and Malawi are third and fourth in the group, respectively
The Burkina Faso team will face Burundi in their next matches in October
